comment.author: 76204898@N00
comment._content: Bruges ( /ˈbruːʒ/ in English; Dutch: Brugge, [ˈbrʏʝə]) is the capital and largest city of the province of West Flanders in the Flemish Region of Belgium. It is located in the northwest of the country. The historic city centre is a prominent World Heritage Site of UNESCO. It is oval-shaped and about 430 hectares in size. In the background, the Belfry of Bruges (also in the background in this photochrom from the LOC P&P collection): [http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/3887197376/]
